Class Zoomer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Zoomer

  • public class Zoomer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the aspects related to the zooming and shifting of the GUI
    Version:
    May 29, 2016
    Author:
    Tejasvi Kothapalli, Period: 3, Sources: none

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void revertToNormal()
      This method reverts to the old transform.
      static void rotateAboutRocket(Rocket rocket, java.awt.Graphics g)
      This allows for a certain thing on the GUI to rotate in the same direct as the rockets rotation.
      static void zoom(Rocket rocket, java.awt.Graphics g, LunarX l, Landscape land)
      This zooms in a section of the screen based on the rocket location.

        public static void zoom(Rocket rocket,
        java.awt.Graphics g,
        LunarX l,
        Landscape land)
        This zooms in a section of the screen based on the rocket location.
        Parameters:
        rocket - The rocket within the GUI
        g - the graphics object
        l - the LunarX object for width and height
        land - the landscape
